channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: How This Works
item.description: Introduction This is a post on how this website is built. I am back to building software in my spare time and I wanted to start documenting the progress. I considered various blog/email software like medium and substack but decided to build my own since I will own the data and I enjoy the building process. Site Generator After years of working in the software industry I have come to appreciate the simplicity of generating html content.
